name: Rski.GitHub.io
body:
### 
Recent Imperial College London graduate.
Currently working at Intracom Telecom Greece as a DevOps engineer.

### Interests
I enjoy [books](https://www.goodreads.com/user/show/22642100-rom) [Goodreads] and have been trying to complete [a reading challenge](https://www.goodreads.com/user_challenges/2925698) [Goodreads] this year like last year. When circumstances allowed I also tried my hand at [Olympic Weightlifting](https://fitocracy.com/profile/rski) [Fitocracy] and occasionally put effort in cooking.

### Programming Interests
Mostly Python, C and Lua. At home I use [spacemacs](https://github.com/syl20bnr/spacemacs) or neovim. I dabble in Puppet and occasionally in Haskell. My Beng project was parallelising part of the Testu01 library, specifically {small,,Big} Crush.

### Contact
I can be found on [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/rskiad), [Github](https://github.com/rski) and my Freenode name is rski.

My CV is available [here](http://www.doc.ic.ac.uk/~rs3011/RskiCV.pdf) [doc.ic.ac.uk]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
